questions.question_text: Karoḍ kām bagāḍīne paṇ ek _____ sudhārvo ne kadāpi karoḍ kām sudhāryā ne ek mokṣha bagāḍyo to temā shu karyu?
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 1/14, one should strive to improve one's moksha even at the cost of losing millions of tasks.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe paṇ e Akṣharrūp je mukta temanī panktimā bhaḷavu chhe ane Akṣhardhāmmā jaīne akhanḍ Bhagwānnī sevāmā hajūr rahevu chhe, paṇ nāshavant ne tuchchh evu je māyik sukh tene ichchhavu nathī ne emā koī ṭhekāṇe lobhāvu nathī.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 21.

questions.question_text: “...marī to sarvene javu chhe paṇ āvī rīte bhakti karavī e ja jīvyāno moṭo lābh chhe...”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 30.

questions.question_text: Ā meḍiyu maḷī chhe ne sāru sāru khāvā maḷe chhe, ke mān maḷe chhe, ityādik _____ dehnu faḷ nathī. Te to vimukhne paṇ maḷe chhe.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 2/19, explaining that good food and respect are not the fruits of a human body.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇo janma be vāt sādhavā sāru thayo chhe, temā ek Akṣharrūp thāvu, emā deh antarāyrūp chhe; ne bīju Bhagwānmā joḍāvu, temā sang anek prakārnā antarāyrūp chhe. E be khoṭ ṭaḷavī.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 4/99, discussing the purpose of our birth.

questions.question_text: Nāshvant ā deh vadhethi, avinashi fal levu ji, _____ jemi karine, bahaar feki devu ji
questions.explanation: From the kirtan by Narayandas Swami, nashvant ā deh...

questions.question_text: Āpaṇo janma be vāt sādhavā sāru thayo chhe, temā ek _____ thāvu, emā deh antarāyrūp chhe; ne bīju Bhagwānmā joḍāvu, temā sang anek prakārnā antarāyrūp chhe. E be khoṭ ṭaḷavī.
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 4/99, one purpose of our birth is to become Aksharrup.

questions.question_text: _____ kām bagāḍīne paṇ ek mokṣha sudhārvo ne kadāpi karoḍ kām sudhāryā ne ek mokṣha bagāḍyo to temā shu karyu?
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 1/14, even losing millions of tasks is worth improving one's moksha.

questions.question_text: Ā meḍiyu maḷī chhe ne _____ khāvā maḷe chhe, ke mān maḷe chhe, ityādik manuṣhya dehnu faḷ nathī. Te to vimukhne paṇ maḷe chhe.
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 2/19, getting good food and respect is not the purpose of this human life.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe paṇ e Akṣharrūp je mukta temanī panktimā bhaḷavu chhe ane Akṣhardhāmmā jaīne _____ sevāmā hajūr rahevu chhe, paṇ nāshavant ne tuchchh evu je māyik sukh tene ichchhavu nathī ne emā koī ṭhekāṇe lobhāvu nathī.
questions.explanation: From Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 21, we should remain in the service of Akhand Bhagwan in Akshardham.
